pr_title: [CDAP-11761] Highlight current file in connector browser for file system, S3, GCS

timeline.bodyText:
Can we do this check directly in the renderRowContent? Seems like this.state.path === this.getFilePath() && content.name === this.getFileName() should be available in the specific function.
Avoids passing this prop down multiple levels.
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

replies.bodyText: You can do the full check there, but my concern was that perform the path check once per row was excessive. If you think it's not a concern, I can make the change.
replies.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText: I think that should be ok. Its a constant time operation (1 check).
replies.author: ajainarayanan
